questions.text: What is the first clue to the scavenger hunt about?
questions.answer: The first clue is linked to tilework by Gaudi

questions.text: What is Ellen's group's first stop on their scavenger hunt?
Why is Ellen disappointed when she is assigned her group?
questions.answer: She has been placed in a separate group from her best friend, Laurel

questions.text: What language do the siblings Xavi and Meritxell speak in addition to Spanish and English?
Which character sleeps long and often?
Which character writes and illustrates their own books?
Which character chooses to eat a non-kosher diet on their trip to Spain?
What is the answer to the clue Ellen and her group create?
Ellen decides to leave her hotel in the middle of the night to see what?
questions.answer: The owl on the front of the building

questions.text: does the main character write down important information in a dot diary?
is it revealed early on that an international school trip will include a scavenger hunt?
does the main character have 4 a.m. chats with her friends in the courtyard of her hotel?
does the main character lie to her best friend so that she can stay in her originally assigned group?
does the main character "out" one of her friends?
does a character enjoy having Saturday sleepovers with her best friend?
